plot outline: Ranna is the official remake of Pawan Kalyan's blockbuster Telugu movie Attarintiki Daredi. The story is about a rich businessman settled abroad. Ever since his daughter married against her father's wishes, the two have been estranged.The old man yearns to see his daughter and charges his grandson with the task of bringing his paternal aunt back. The grandson reaches his aunt's place and masquerades as a driver. The film revolves around whether the hero will succeed in reconciling father and daughter.
title: Ranna
plot: A rich man is pining for his daughter who left him 25 years ago. He wants her back in the family, something only his grandson Bhargava can make happen.

_Ranna_ (qv) is the official remake of Pawan Kalyan's blockbuster Telugu movie Attarintiki Daredi. The story is about a rich businessman settled abroad. Ever since his daughter married against her father's wishes, the two have been estranged.The old man yearns to see his daughter and charges his grandson with the task of bringing his paternal aunt back. The grandson reaches his aunt's place and masquerades as a driver. The film revolves around whether the hero will succeed in reconciling father and daughter.

The film focuses on bhargava(dushyant) , a business heir who acts as a driver in his estranged aunt's(arjun) house to mend her strained relationship with his grandfather(prakash raj) who expelled her for marrying against his wishes years before.::Jnanesh Alva
